summary: Audited the Beauty Booking React module against the backend checklist: APIs/hooks cover most endpoints and components exist for bookings, packages, loyalty, consultations, retail, and salon search; identified gaps including missing dashboard overview/stats, limited booking filters and cancel reason input, no gift-card purchase UI, no wallet transaction view, missing location filters, read-only conversations, and a retail order payload mismatch (products vs items).
current_status: Codebase unchanged; all audit todos complete; implementation of identified gaps still needed.
